title: In mono comp LR, price exceeds marginal cost

content.question: Firms in monopolistic competition do not attain allocative efficiency because at the long-run equilibrium output, which of the following is true?

choices.label: Price is greater than marginal cost.
Marginal cost is greater than minimum average total cost.
Marginal revenue is greater than marginal cost.
There is an overallocation of resources to the market.

content.answer: Price is greater than marginal cost.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
